title: Argus Bindings
description: A configuration file which provides one-to-many mappings from input actions to semantic actions for multiple input device types.

keyboard.description: Bindings for actions triggered by the keyboard.

keys.description: Bindings for actions triggered by keyboard keys.

scancode.description: The numeric scancode of the key which triggers the actions.

actions.description: The actions triggered by the binding.

mouse.description: Bindings for actions triggered by mouse buttons and axes.

buttons.description: Bindings for actions triggered by mouse buttons.

index.description: The index of the button on the mouse.

actions.description: The actions triggered by the binding.

axes.description: Bindings for actions triggered by mouse axes.

axis.description: The mouse axis which triggers the actions.

actions.description: The actions triggered by the binding.

gamepad.description: Bindings for actions triggered by gamepad buttons and axes.

buttons.description: Bindings for actions triggered by gamepad buttons.

index.description: The index of the button on the gamepad.

actions.description: The actions triggered by the binding.

axes.description: Bindings for actions triggered by gamepad axes.

index.description: The index of the axis on the gamepad.

actions.description: The actions triggered by the binding.
